summary: WHILE DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE AT APPROXIMATELY 55 MILES AN HOUR ON STRAIGHT ROAD AT STEADY SPEED WITHOUT WARNING THE TRUCK BEGAN TO LURCH JUMP AND LOSE POWER, REGAIN POWER AND LOSE  POWER.  I NOTICED THAT THE SPEEDOMETER WAS VERY ERRATIC AND I HAD A LIGHT FLASHING ON THE DASH AS WELL. THIS PATTERN REPEATED UNTIL I EVENTUALLY HAD TO PULL OFF THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND RESTART THE TRUCK. IT DROVE CORRECTLY THE REST OF THE WAY HOME AFTER THAT.  *TR
